pr_title: Added option to save the generated OpenAPI schema document on build.

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer if we used Directory rather than Dir.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -10,4 +13,11 @@
      */
     @ConfigItem(defaultValue = "/openapi")
     public String path;
+
+    /**
+     * If set, the generated OpenAPI schema documents will be stored here on build.
+     * Both openapi.json and openapi.yaml will be stored here if this is set.
+     */
+    @ConfigItem
+    public Optional<Path> storeSchemaDir;

timeline.message:
Added option to save the generated OpenAPI schema document on build

Signed-off-by: Phillip Kruger <phillip.kruger@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: When specifying a relative path this appears to be relative to the working directory of where the build is running. I would instead have expected it to be relative to the Maven project's basedir. See issue #11846.
timeline.author: knutwannheden
